name: Allium Drawing Tool
description: The drawing tool for Geometry Dash

brush-color-id.name: Brush Color ID
brush-color-id.description: (Temporary) The ID of the brush color

brush-free-threshold.name: Free Threshold
brush-free-threshold.description: (Temporary) Value in game units where a point is decimated if its distance to the segment is less than this value

font-path.description: (Temporary) The path to the font file

text-detail-threshold.name: Text detail threshold
text-detail-threshold.description: (Temporary) Value in game units where a point is decimated if its distance to the segment is less than this value

triangle-padding.name: Triangle Padding
triangle-padding.description: (Temporary) The percent of padding added to the triangle's size when drawing polygons and text. (Corners will be jagged, recommended if you have gaps showing up, between 1% and 2% works best)
